oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup Aired Performance - 1946-08-31 - KOMA - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program, staff includes Hiram Higsby (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), Kenyon Brown (producer). Performances feature Lem Hawkins (performer), Dick Reinhart (performers), Ann Bond (performer), Hiram Higsby (performer), Mary Lou (performer), and Chuck Davis (performer) on August 31, 1946 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Lem Hawkins; Dick Reinhart; Ann Bond; Hiram Higsby; Mary Lou; Chuck Davis
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Allan Page tells a joke / (0:25) Hiram Higsby introduces Lem Hawkins / (0:37) Lem Hawkins tells a joke / (2:15) Lem Hawkins performs "[Unidentified banjo tune]" / (3:27) Hiram Higsby introduces Dick Reinhart / (3:40) Dick Reinhart performs "Rock Me To Sleep In My Saddle" / (6:00) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (6:50) Hiram Higsby and Ann Bond tell a joke / (7:24) Ann Bond performs "Hillbilly Gaucho" / (9:00) Lem Hawkins tells a joke / (9:31) Hiram Higsby and Lem Hawkins perform "Open Up Them Pearly Gates" / (10:50) Hiram Higsby introduces the next song / (11:00) Dick Reinhart and Mary Lou perform "I Called And Nobody Answered Me" / (13:01) Hiram Higsby talks / (13:08) Closing theme and statements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); CBS Inc.; Reinhart, Dick; Bond, Ann; Higsby, Hiram, 1909-1975; Davis, Chuck;
